attributes.action: Prosecute the BBC for gross political bias in relation to Jeremy Corbyn.
attributes.background: The BBC continuously present Jeremy Corbyn in such a way as to damage his good standing politically to deter potential voters in direct violation of the Impartiality section of Media regulations. They have also deliberately not reported on his rallies despite the attendance of thousands of people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
